sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PAYR0415 ( DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #payYr# ,(SELECT TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM FROM PAYR0400 WHERE DPOB_CD= #dpobCd# AND TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd# AND DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd# ) , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PAYR0415 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , PAY_YR=#payYr# , TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=#payYr# AND TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PAYR0415 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=#payYr# AND TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum#

DELETE FROM PAYR0415 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=#payYr# AND TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM= (SELECT TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM FROM PAYR0400 WHERE DPOB_CD= #dpobCd# AND TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd# AND DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0415 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=#payYr# AND TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.PAY_YR , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , CC.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,CC.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , CC.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , CC.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(CC.DPOB_CD,CC.TYP_OCCU_CD,CC.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , CC.PYSP_GRDE_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,CC.PYSP_GRDE_CD) AS PYSP_GRDE_NM , AA.KYBDR , AA.INPT_DT , AA.INPT_ADDR , AA.ISMT , AA.REVN_DT , AA.REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0415 AA ,PAYR0410 BB, PAYR0400 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD= CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = CC.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.DPOB_CD= BB.DPOB_CD(+) AND AA.PAY_YR= BB.PAY_YR(+) AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = BB.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM(+)
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.PAY_YR=#payYr#
BB.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
CC.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd#
NVL(CC.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000')=#pyspGrdeCd#
CC.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd#
BB.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD(+) = #pymtDducDivCd#
ORDER BY AA.DPOB_CD DESC , AA.PAY_YR DESC , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.PAY_YR , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , CC.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,CC.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , CC.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , CC.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(CC.DPOB_CD,CC.TYP_OCCU_CD,CC.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , CC.PYSP_GRDE_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,CC.PYSP_GRDE_CD) AS PYSP_GRDE_NM , AA.KYBDR , AA.INPT_DT , AA.INPT_ADDR , AA.ISMT , AA.REVN_DT , AA.REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0415 AA ,PAYR0410 BB, PAYR0400 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD= CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = CC.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.DPOB_CD= BB.DPOB_CD(+) AND AA.PAY_YR= BB.PAY_YR(+) AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = BB.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM(+)
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.PAY_YR=#payYr#
BB.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
CC.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd#
NVL(CC.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000')=#pyspGrdeCd#
CC.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd#
BB.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD(+) = #pymtDducDivCd#
)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT PAY_YR , (PAY_YR) AS PAY_YR_DISP FROM PAYR0415 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
ORDER BY PAY_YR DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PAYR0415 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
